title: Algo Right
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150417110403im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Algo-Right_5195.jpg)

Let me know what you're thinkin folks!
author: spookDD

comments.content:
I like most these, especially how the R and S differ by only a tiny bit, but are totally different. The main letter that's grating me a little bit is the X, I kind of expect the bottom half to be forward of the top half ... the 8 as well.

_«El futuro es una línea tan fina que apenas nos damos cuenta de pintarla nosotros mismos». (La Luz Oscura, por Javier Guerrero)_
I like that - it would widen them out as well. Glad you you enjoyed it!
